definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to

sentences.english: Don't remember from when, baby George started protesting against our NOs.
sentences.chinese: 不记得从什么时候开始，宝贝儿就学会了撒泼耍赖。

sentences.english: She was very embarrassed when her child behaved badly in public.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子在人家面前撒泼，把她窘得下不了台。

sentences.english: She flounced about like a mad woman.

definition: to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to shout and scream (idiom); to kick up a fuss/to make a scene
to act shamelessly/to refuse to acknowledge that one has lost the game, or made a promise etc/to act dumb/to act as if sth never happened
to get drunk and act crazy/roaring drunk
shouting abuse in the street like a fishwife
to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: to shout abuses in the street
